|Rank=A
|Title=Knowing the main long-term consequences of HGI in women
|Description=None
|Topic=Follow-up and/or prognosis

Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and ectopic pregnancy

question.question: What are the main long-term consequences of having Pelvic Inflammatory Disease (PID) in women?
question.option_a: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and ectopic pregnancy
question.option_b: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and infertility in men
question.option_c: Pelvic inflammatory disease, infertility and ectopic pregnancy
question.option_d: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and sexually transmitted infections (STIs)
question.correct_option: Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and ectopic pregnancy
